@dev constructor sets the operator's address
@param _operator address of the contract's operator

@dev verifies the operator as the original tx sender
@return bool indicating if operator is the original sender

prefixed
verify

recover(bytes32,bytes).details: Recover signer address from a message using their signature

params._signature: bytes is generated by signing a hashed message

returns._0: address recovered from the given hash and signature

verify(bytes32,bytes).details: Verify if a hashed message was signed by the contract's operator

params._signature: bytes _signature generated when operator signed the hash

returns._0: bool indicating if operator is the signer

verifyBytes(bytes,bytes).details: recreates the hashed prefixed message signed on the client from raw message bytes

params._signature: bytes _signature is the operator's signature upon the hashed, prefixed message

returns._0: bool indicating if operator is the signer

verifyOperator().details: verifies the operator as the original tx sender

returns._0: bool indicating if operator is the original sender
